alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:40PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT COFFEE AND WESTERN GENEVA COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CST... At 339 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brantley to 10 miles northwest of Wright. Movement was east at 40 mph. At 336PM CST, the K79J station gusted to 46 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Novosel, Samson, New Brockton, Lee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Roeton, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Arcus, and Enterprise Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
